name: VFX to fantasy and freedom
description: Founded in Sydney, and now with offices worldwide, Animal Logic are an Academy Award-winning VFX and animation studio whose job is to bring the impossible to life. And they're in good company with these other artists and filmmakers.

end.title: House of Flying Daggers
end.creator_credit: Bin Wang, William Kong, Zhang Yimou, China Film Co-Production Corporation, Edko Films Ltd., Elite Group Enterprises and Zhang Yimou Studio
end.brief_description: In 9th century China, a corrupt government wages war against a rebel army called the Flying Daggers. A romantic warrior breaks a beautiful rebel out of prison to help her rejoin her fellows, but things are not what they seem.

constellations_other.name: VFX to fantasy and freedom
constellations_other.description: Founded in Sydney, and now with offices worldwide, Animal Logic are an Academy Award-winning VFX and animation studio whose job is to bring the impossible to life. And they're in good company with these other artists and filmmakers.

constellations_other.name: Right on cue
constellations_other.description: In the silent film era, cue sheets charted major moments of a film, along with recommended audio accompaniment matching the action on screen.

links.description: To bring the beloved children’s characters to life in Peter Rabbit, Animal Logic used both practical and digital effects. It’s the kind of process that has made them world-renowned since their early days working on films like House Of Flying Daggers.

end.title: Godzilla vs. Kong
end.creator_credit: Alex Garcia, Brian Rogers, Eric McLeod, Jon Jashni, Mary Parent, Thomas Tull, Tom Hammock, Eric Pearson, Max Borenstein, Michael Dougherty, Terry Rossio, Zach Shields, Joe Howes and Reetu Aggarwal
end.brief_description: In a time when monsters walk the Earth, humanity’s fight for its future sets Godzilla and Kong on a collision course that will see the two most powerful forces of nature on the planet clash in a spectacular battle for the ages.

constellations_other.name: VFX to fantasy and freedom
constellations_other.description: Founded in Sydney, and now with offices worldwide, Animal Logic are an Academy Award-winning VFX and animation studio whose job is to bring the impossible to life. And they're in good company with these other artists and filmmakers.

links.description: House Of Flying Daggers was the highly anticipated follow up to director Zhang Yimou’s Hero, which Animal Logic also worked on. It starred Zhang Ziyi, who also plays a recurring role in the current Kaiju films like Godzilla Vs. Kong.

start.title: Godzilla vs. Kong

end.title: The Guest
end.brief_description: A soldier introduces himself to the Peterson family, claiming to be a friend of their son who died in action. After the young man is welcomed into their home, a series of accidental deaths seem to be connected to his presence.

constellations_other.name: VFX to fantasy and freedom
constellations_other.description: Founded in Sydney, and now with offices worldwide, Animal Logic are an Academy Award-winning VFX and animation studio whose job is to bring the impossible to life. And they're in good company with these other artists and filmmakers.

links.description: Godzilla Vs. Kong was directed by Adam Wingard, who is better known as a writer, director, editor, producer, cinematographer and even composer on lower-budget genre movies like The Guest.

end.title: Legion

video_links.name: Legion Official Trailer #1 [HD] | An Original Series From FX and Marvel

end.brief_description: David Haller, AKA Legion, is a troubled young man who may be more than human.

constellations_other.name: VFX to fantasy and freedom
constellations_other.description: Founded in Sydney, and now with offices worldwide, Animal Logic are an Academy Award-winning VFX and animation studio whose job is to bring the impossible to life. And they're in good company with these other artists and filmmakers.

links.description: A riff on the ‘super soldier’ trope, The Guest was the brainchild of Wingard and his frequent collaborator Simon Barrett and tapped into the aesthetic of 80s action flicks. It starred Dan Stevens, who would go on to spearhead the mind-bending Legion.

end.title: Blindspotting
end.creator_credit: Emily Batson, Daveed Diggs, Jess Calder, Keith Calder, Rafael Casal and Tom Hammock

video_links.name: Blindspotting (2018 Movie) Official Trailer - Daveed Diggs, Rafael Casal

end.brief_description: Collin must make it through his final three days of probation for a chance at a new beginning.

constellations_other.name: VFX to fantasy and freedom
constellations_other.description: Founded in Sydney, and now with offices worldwide, Animal Logic are an Academy Award-winning VFX and animation studio whose job is to bring the impossible to life. And they're in good company with these other artists and filmmakers.

links.description: One of the most unusual and trippy television shows in recent years, Legion took a hard-left turn from conventional storytelling in the X-Men universe. Carlos López Estrada directed an episode from the final season, a year after the release of his film Blindspotting.

end.title: The Good Lord Bird
end.creator_credit: Blumhouse Television and Under the Influence Productions

video_links.name: The Good Lord Bird (2020) Official Trailer | Ethan Hawke SHOWTIME Series

end.brief_description: Enslaved teenager Henry Shackleford, aka Little Onion, becomes a member in abolitionist John Brown’s motley family during the Bleeding Kansas era before the Civil War.

constellations_other.name: VFX to fantasy and freedom
constellations_other.description: Founded in Sydney, and now with offices worldwide, Animal Logic are an Academy Award-winning VFX and animation studio whose job is to bring the impossible to life. And they're in good company with these other artists and filmmakers.

links.description: Mexican American filmmaker Estrada Blindspotting is a modern examination of race and racism in Oakland. Both the film and TV series The Good Lord Bird featured Daveed Diggs, one of the breakout stars of the musical Hamilton and conceptual rap group Clipping.

end.title: Women Without Shadows
end.brief_description: A series of interviews which try to establish the current role of the woman in the Saudi society in relation with the recent past.

constellations_other.name: VFX to fantasy and freedom
constellations_other.description: Founded in Sydney, and now with offices worldwide, Animal Logic are an Academy Award-winning VFX and animation studio whose job is to bring the impossible to life. And they're in good company with these other artists and filmmakers.

links.description: The Good Lord Bird follows freedom fighters crossing America to end slavery in the 1850s. The first female filmmaker in Saudi Arabia, Haifaa Al-Mansour, directs a pivotal episode and made her debut with the documentary Women Without Shadows about the female role in Saudi society.
